Name: Zombie Claus
About the game: Description You find yourself in a big empty house. Around the Christmas lights, but no friends, no family. You are alone. What for?  Zombie Claus is a game in which everything is not as it seems. The main character behaved badly all year, for which a bad Santa wants to punish him. Game Features: • Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of Christmas horror. If you're looking for something to play during the holidays, Zombie Claus is the perfect choice. • Feel lonely. Only you and the evil Santa are in the house. And soon he will catch you. • Puzzles - solve puzzles to access areas, collect and use objects found in the environment. • Explore dark and disturbing rooms for answers. • High-quality voice acting.
